001package calibration_demos;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.net.MalformedURLException;
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.net.URISyntaxException;
008import java.net.URL;
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010import java.nio.file.Paths;
011
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.io.LogStream;
015import ij.io.Opener;
016import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
017import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.ZhangData;
018import imagingbook.lib.ij.IjUtils;
019import imagingbook.lib.util.ResourceUtils;
020import imagingbook.lib.util.resource.ResourceLocation;
021import imagingbook.lib.util.resource.ResourceLocation.Resource;
022
023/**
024 * Opens Zhang's standard calibration images as a stack of RGB images. 
025 * The image data are stored as a resource in the local Java class tree.
026 * This plugin also demonstrates the use of the resource access
027 * mechanism.
028 * 
029 * @author W. Burger
030 * @version 2021-07-26
031 *
032 */
033public class Open_Test_Images implements PlugIn {
034        
035        static {
036                LogStream.redirectSystem();
037        }
038        
039//      static Class<?> resourceRootClass = ZhangData.class;
040//      static String resourceDir = "resources/";
041        static String resourceName = "CalibImageStack.tif";
042        //static String resourceName = "marked1.png";
043        //static String resourceName = "CalibIm1.jpg";
044        //static String resourceName = "data1.txt";
045
046        public void run(String args) {
047                
048                ResourceLocation loc = new imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.DATA.RLOC();
049                
050                if(loc.insideJAR())
051                        IJ.log("Resources in JAR file: " + loc.getPath());
052                else
053                        IJ.log("Resources in regular file: " + loc.getPath());
054                
055                URI rootURI = loc.getUri();
056                Path rootPath = loc.getPath();
057                
058                IJ.log("getURI()           = " + rootURI);
059                IJ.log("getPath()          = " + rootPath);
060                IJ.log("Paths.get(rootURI) = " + Paths.get(rootURI));
061
062                IJ.log("");
063
064//              Resource[] resources1 = loc.getResources();
065//              IJ.log("Resources found (1): " + resources1.length);
066//              for (Resource res : resources1) {
067//                      IJ.log("   " + res.getName() + " | " + res.getURL());
068//              }
069                
070//              Path[] paths2 = loc.getResourcePaths();
071//              IJ.log("Resources found (2): " + paths2.length);
072//              for (Path p : paths2) {
073//                      IJ.log("   " + p);
074//              }
075                
076                String[] names = loc.getResourceNames();
077                IJ.log("Resources found (names): " + names.length);
078                for (String p : names) {
079                        IJ.log("   " + p);
080                }
081                
082//              Path p = loc.getPath(resourceName);
083//              if (p == null) {
084//                      IJ.error("Resource not found!");
085//              }
086                
087//              IJ.log("\nPath to " + resourceName + ": " + p);
088                
089//              InputStream strm = loc.getResourceAsStream(resourceName);
090//              IJ.log("\nStream to " + resourceName + ": " + strm);
091                
092                //ImagePlus im = IjUtils.openImage(p);  // does not work if in JAR
093                //ImagePlus im = openTiffFromStream(strm, resourceName);        // works
094                
095                ImagePlus im = null;
096
097                Resource res = loc.getResource(resourceName);
098                IJ.log("\nOpening image: " + res.getName());
099                IJ.log("Is in JAR: " + loc.insideJAR());
100                
101                Path path = res.getPath();
102                IJ.log("Path = " + path + " (" + path.getClass() + ")");
103                IJ.log("Path.toUri() = " + path.toUri());
104                try {
105                        IJ.log("Path.toUri().toURL() = " + path.toUri().toURL());
106                } catch (MalformedURLException e) {     }
107                
108                //im = new Opener().openURL(url.toString());
109                im = new Opener().openImage(res.getUri().toString());
110                
111                //im = res.openAsImage(); // uses URL
112                
113
114                
115                if (im != null) {
116                        im.show();
117                }
118                else {
119                        IJ.error("Could not open image " + resourceName);
120                }
121                
122                IJ.log("---------------------------------");
123                IJ.log("res.getURI()  = " + res.getUri());
124//              IJ.log("res.getURL()  = " + res.getURL());
125                IJ.log("res.getPath() = " + res.getPath());
126//              try {
127//                      IJ.log("res.getURL().toURI() = " + res.getURL().toURI());
128//              } catch (URISyntaxException e) {}
129
130                IJ.log("res.getStream() = " + res.getStream());
131        }
132        
133        
134//      private ImagePlus openTiffFromStream(InputStream is, String name) {
135//              IJ.log("opening TIFF from stream ...");
136//              return new Opener().openTiff(is, name);
137//      }
138        
139}
